cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause security configuration parsing failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting hw_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause log configuration parsing failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 hw_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致日誌配置解析失敗。
